verbose_text: In addition, an EPEC strain overexpressing the ADP-ribosyltransferase EspJ, which inactivates non receptor tyrosine kinases and suppresses Tir signaling, also induced less pyroptosis (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY E).
evidence: ADP-ribosyltransferase EspJ, which inactivates non-receptor tyrosine kinases and suppresses Tir
